summary: Contoso Wireless provides a reliable internet connection with unlimited data usage, fast download speeds, and secure Wi-Fi access. Additional features include parental controls, firewall protection, virus protection, and access to streaming services. They offer speeds up to 1Gbps with up to 200Mbps upload speeds. They have a promotion for new customers where they can save up to 20% on their first 3 months of service and discounts for bundling other products. Customer service and technical support are available 24/7 via phone or email and they provide an online Knowledge Base as well as on-site technical support at no extra cost.
